text: William Wilfred Campbell (1 June 1860 â€“ 1 January 1918) was a Canadian poet. He is one of the Confederation Poets, a group of poets born during Canada's Confederation (in 1860s). By the end of the 19th century, he was thought as the "unofficial poet laureate of Canada." ==William Wilfred Campbell Poetry Festival== William Wilfred Campbell Poetry Festival is an Arts festival founded and directed by Paul Kastner in 2014 in Wiarton, Ontario. This festival is held every year in his respect. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==Other websites== * * ==References== Category:1860 births Category:1918 deaths Category:Canadian poets Category:People from Newmarket, Ontario Category:People from Owen Sound Category:Writers from Ontario
title: William Wilfred Campbell
